name: pink princess makeover games for girls
name_original: pink princess makeover games for girls
description:
Pink Princess Makeup Salon is coming! We brought you more fashion elements! Are you interested in the latest fashion trend? Do you want to enjoy a princess life?You can select your favorite model and give your pink princess & prepare her for an awesome makeover.Give your model a relax and nice back spa, then facial salon, makeup her and dress up her with so many nice and colorful items.

After your beautiful pink princess is done with the spa and facial treatment, give her the best makeup to make her look special and amazing. You can choose between a large variety of items available for Eye Shades and shadows, Change eye lens and you can even put blush on. Once your pony look super cute, change your pink princess’s hair from the catalog for a trendier look. So download this awesome game right away and start playing. Princess Fashion Salon is a paradise of makeup! Makeup like a princess !

Features

-Different princess salon for Princess makeup, more in character
- Create Fabulous Hairstyles!
-Give her an awesome spa treatment
- Stunning Make-up choices!
-Give these princesses the best makeover to make her look more beautiful
- Glamorous Dresses!
-Choose different hair styles to make your pink princess look more trendy
